text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Make sure you focus on your stupid failed wall. 
Trump wants to change the subject from covid-19 to immigration to distract everyone and inflame his base. Why did he ignore the pandemic so long? Where's the testing he promised? https://t.co/SdIY9KOZbu
